title: Repaso del Segundo Trimestre (A1)

sections.title: Vocabulario Principal
sections.content:
Resumen de palabras esenciales:

- **Money**: Cash, Card, Coins, Notes.
- **Bank**: Account, Manager, ATM, PIN.
- **Shopping**: Buy, Pay, Receipt, Change, Cost.
- **Numbers**: Hundred, Thousand, Million.
- **Time**: Day, Week, Month, Appointment.

sections.title: Gramática Básica
sections.content:
Estructuras que debes recordar:

- **Present Simple**: I pay, He buys.
- **Questions**: How much...? What time...? Do you have...?
- **Prepositions**: At 5:00, On Monday, In April.
- **Imperatives**: Enter your PIN, Click here.

objectives: Repasar el vocabulario básico de finanzas de nivel A1
Consolidar las estructuras de presente simple y preposiciones
Prepararse para el examen final del trimestre A1

keyTerms.definition: A test to show what you know.
